welcome_message_body: Welcome to Aves, Portugal! This charming city is known for its picturesque landscapes, historic architecture, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything this beautiful destination has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Braga Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines and some seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
